name: Beyond Catastrophe
description:
This is an early implementation, but it is feature-complete. The story exists, but we would have liked to expand it some more.

Controls PC:

  • WASD/Arrow-keys: movement
  • I/M/TAB: open inventory
  • E: use selected (equipped) item
  • Q: collect item or interact with item
  • 1/2/3: change equipped item slot
  • ENTER: dialogue progress/confirm
  • P: menu
  • Mouse: interact with inventory items

Controls Controller:

  • Left Joystick: movement
  • Start: open inventory
  • Button West: use selected (equipped) item
  • Button North: collect item or interact with item
  • Left/Right Shoulder: cycle through equipped item slots
  • Button South: dialogue progress/confirm
  • Select: menu
